casebody.data:
BREWER, et al.
v.
FLINN. No. 96P07-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2007. Andrew Lassiter, Morehead City, for Mack, et al. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Brewer, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of August 2007 by Defendant for Injunctive Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of November 2007."
